name: Gunsight, Electronic
description: Electronic sights with image enhancement and low-light capabilities are available to provide the capability to see and hit in the dark. The electronic gunsight increases accuracy, especially at longer ranges. A rifle equipped with such sights decreases apparent distance beyond Long Range by 1 band.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Gunsight, Electronic (Image Enhancement)
description: Electronic sights with image enhancement. The electronic gunsight increases accuracy, especially at longer ranges. A rifle equipped with such sights decreases apparent distance beyond Long Range by 1 band.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Gunsight, Electronic (Low Light Enhancement)
description: Electronic sights with low-light enhancement to provide the capability to see and hit in the dark. The electronic gunsight increases accuracy, especially at longer ranges. A rifle equipped with such sights decreases apparent distance beyond Long Range by 1 band.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Gunsight, Electronic (Image and Low Light Enhancements)
description: Electronic sights with image enhancement and low-light capabilities provide the capability to see and hit in the dark. The electronic gunsight increases accuracy, especially at longer ranges. A rifle equipped with such sights decreases apparent distance beyond Long Range by 1 band.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Gunsight, Telescopic
description: High-quality telescopic sight for attachment to rifles and carbines. The telescopic gunsight increases accuracy, especially at longer ranges. A rifle equipped with such sights decreases apparent distance beyond Long Range by 1 band.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Sling, Leather
description: A rifle sling made of a natural leather product.

name: Sling, Synthetic
description: A rifle sling made of a synthetic material.
